title: Secretary Defence meets Polish Defence Officials
content: Secretary, Ministry of Defense and Urban Development Gotabaya Rajapaksa visited Poland at the invitation of Minister of National Defense Tomasz Siemoniak to attend the 20th International Defense Industry Exhibition (MPSO) held in Kielce from 3rd – 6th September 2012.
